wikipedia_page.main: George Phillips Bevan (b. Beaufort, Blaenau Gwent 1829 – 1889)  F.S.S., F.G.S.  was a Welsh statistician, geographer and author, and the brother of William Latham Bevan.His father was William Hibbs Bevan (1788-1846) who was high sheriff for Breconshire 1841, and his brother William Bevan (priest) was archdeacon of Brecon from 1875. His mother  Margaret, daughter of Joseph Latham, was also of Beaufort.
